title: 联机崩溃！！
author: y546365210
txt_content:
想上MCbbs的服务器玩玩，。    下了客户端 点多人游戏 加入服务器的时候就崩溃了 

  崩溃信息如下：

replies.author: y546365210
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to E:\Game\minecraft\MCBBSLauncher\Minecraft-1.3.2新手整合包\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-01-19_09.52.41-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 3477f192 --------
Generated 1/19/13 9:52 AM

- Minecraft Version: 1.3.2
- Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_07, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 32607552 bytes (31 MB) / 58449920 bytes (55 MB) up to 406061056 bytes (387 MB)
- JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx400M
- ModLoader: Mods loaded: 3
ModLoader 1.3.2
Inventory Tweaks 1.43 (1.3.2)
mod_ReiMinimap v3.2_05  汉化MCBBS_荧惑(NightWish)、月姬 [1.3.2]

- LWJGL: 2.8.4
- OpenGL: GeForce 9300 GS/PCIe/SSE2 GL version 3.3.0, NVIDIA Corporation
- Is Modded: Very likely
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: Default
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at hw.a(SourceFile:120)

        at dx.<init>(SourceFile:22)
        at asv.a(NetClientHandler.java:116)
        at dm.a(SourceFile:41)

        at asv.d(NetClientHandler.java:89)
        at asy.c(SourceFile:69)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.l(SourceFile:1080)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.J(SourceFile:583)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:535)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 4a981aee ----------
目测模组问题。（不要问我了，我不能回答了。）

replies.author: 大兴
replies.txt_content: 目测是mod，问题，用纯净版的进去试试？

replies.author: y546365210
replies.txt_content:
大兴 发表于 2013-1-19 14:44 
目测是mod，问题，用纯净版的进去试试？
纯净的也是一样崩溃。

replies.author: 大兴
replies.txt_content: 这个真心无力了，你可能需要去问问那里的腐竹
